TestCase.name: shuffle inner join
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1 INNER JOIN t2 ON t1.v1 = t2.v1

RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], columns=[v1,v2,v3]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v1,v2])

TestCase.name: shuffle outer join1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1 FULL OUTER JOIN t2 ON t1.v1 = t2.v1

RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[full]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], columns=[v1,v2,v3]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v1,v2])

TestCase.name: shuffle outer join2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1 FULL OUTER JOIN t2 ON t1.v2 = t2.v1

RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[full]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], columns=[v1,v2,v3]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v1,v2])

TestCase.name: shuffle outer join3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1 FULL OUTER JOIN t2 ON t1.v3 = t2.v2

RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($2, $4)], joinType=[full]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[2]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], columns=[v1,v2,v3]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v1,v2])

TestCase.name: sort merge join
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1 JOIN t2 ON t1.v1 = t2.v1 ORDER BY t1.v1

RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[0]]) RwBatchSortMergeJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[0]]) RwBatchSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], columns=[v1,v2,v3]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[0]]) RwBatchSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v1,v2])
